comments.raw_text:
I just donated (https://donate.mozilla.org/tshirt-tw), and paid via Paypal.

I noticed the Paypal page has the Mozilla dino head, but also has three bizarre-looking "dots" below and the the right (see attached screenshot).

Turns out the image is https://www.mozilla.org/images/paypal/Mozilla_Foundation_paypal_header_96x90.png, and the "dots" are the top few pixels of the "ill" in "Mozilla". Something's just cropping the image.
comments.creator: jdinbox@gmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 570623
Screenshot

I just donated (https://donate.mozilla.org/tshirt-tw), and paid via Paypal.

I noticed the Paypal page has the Mozilla dino head, but also has three bizarre-looking "dots" below and the the right (see attached screenshot).

Turns out the image is https://www.mozilla.org/images/paypal/Mozilla_Foundation_paypal_header_96x90.png, and the "dots" are the top few pixels of the "ill" in "Mozilla". Something's just cropping the image.
comments.author: jdinbox@gmail.com
